name: Yellow Wolfing
description:
For a website that was developed by WolfKodi - https://wolfkodi.dyndns.org/wolfing/


Yellow Wolfing uses the Dark Mode codes of Wolfing and in simplicity, darkens everything with a hint of yellow.


If there's any bugs, join the support server: https://discord.gg/DhrdHfG
additional_info:
9th August 2018 v1.0.0 - First release.
13th August 2018 v1.1.0 - Changed notification color.
22nd August 2018 v2.0.0 - Edited scrollbar
